value:
This may all just be for the festival,
but that doesn't mean everything
here is fake.$k$pSo long as the wedding gifts keep
coming, I'm happy to pour all my
heart into this!

You know, my sisters and I have
never actually talked about marriage...
Isn't that weird?$k$pYou'd think a topic like that would
come up at least once in a family
so brimming with beauties!

I booked a venue for the after-party!
We still need to figure something out
for the after-after-party, though...$k$pMight as well charge these lovebirds
for their honeymoon send-off while
I'm at it!

The Voice of the Divine Dragon is
here, and she's brought a friend!
That means double the autographs!

Oh, a bridal bouquet? I hear those
are in pretty high demand right now,
but I can get you one for half-price.

Business is booming, so I'm here to
share the love! Send the thank-you
gifts to $Nf!

I don't normally like standing out this
much, but it's been great for drawing
in new customers. Wanna see?$k$pAhem... Feast your eyes on these
gowns that'll have you feeling bold
and adored on the big day!

Here's the deal: if you can avoid
boring me to tears, I'll let you partner
up with me for the next big event!

Oof, that really could have gone
better. Guess Lady Luck isn't on
your side today, huh?

Are you sure you're not mistaking me
for one of my sisters? Well, either
way, I'll gladly accept this gift!

I'm Anna, the premier purveyor of
happiness! If there's business to be
had, I'll be there!$k$pAnd if I just so happen to run into a
special someone of my own along the
way, that'll only sweeten the deal!

Oh, bridal festival, my beloved...
These fancy dresses and suits are
practically flying off the shelves.$k$pImmensely expensive garments are in
season, and just in time to balloon my
margins to new heights!$k$pThey say money talks, and that's
never been truer. Tying the knot is
nice and all, but it's so expensive!$k$pOh, don't get me wrongâ€”I'm not
trying to squash anyone's dreams of
the perfect big day.$k$pEven I've thought about finding
someone and building that kind of
loving relationship, you know.$k$pBut that's enough of that talk. This is
a festival, right? We should be going
out and having some fun!$k$p...What, nervous? Me? Fine, fine. Even
I can act like a blushing maiden when
faced with a promising prospect.$k$pAnyway, um... I feel like taking a walk,
but I want you to lead. Here, take my
arm... There! The rest is up to you.$k$pAnd before you ask, I have absolutely
no ulterior motive. We're just
enjoying a casual stroll together, OK?!
My dress!
Bring a better gift next time!
Dual income, here I come!
I'll pierce your heart!
For richer or for richer...
You're no fun...
Hm? Come on, I can devote myself to things other than money!
Hey, no laughing! It's normal to get nervous before a big payday!
This dress is kind of uncomfortable, but it's worth wearing just for the gifts!
You know, I wonder if any of my sisters have gotten married...
I'm not the type to sit back and be taken care of. After all, two sources of income are better than one!
I'm about to start planning a ceremony of my own... Just think of all the wedding gifts. Mm.
I'm glad you got to see me dressed up like this before the festival ended. Not bad, huh?
You got it!
Ready yet?
Hand in hand.
